metadata.title: CVE-2021-41805 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul Enterprise before 1.8.17, 1.9.x before 1.9.11, and 1.10.xbefore 1.10.4 has Incorrect Access Control. An ACL token (with the defaultoperator:write permissions) in one namespace can be used for unintendedprivilege escalation in a different namespace.

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
